sentences.sContent: Information is also available on women’s health care.
sentences.sCn: 还可以获得有关女性保健方面的资料。

sentences.sContent: She sings beautifully and also plays the flute and piano.
sentences.sCn: 她歌唱得好，而且还会吹长笛和弹钢琴。

sentences.sContent: The system was not only complicated but also ineffective.
sentences.sCn: 这套系统不仅复杂而且效率低。

sentences.sContent: My girlfriend was also called Helen.
...They also had talk therapy with a nurse before and after quit day...
...Decentralization of authority was also found to be more effective in military operations...
...The researchers also note that dogs scan faces as a whole to sense how people are feeling...
...but also our ability to remain globally competitive...
...Digital technology also makes it easier for people to co-ordinate their activities without resorting to hierarchy...
...The river basin is not only the birthplace of the ancient Chinese civilization，but also the most prosperous region in the early history of China...
...you could also visit me at my dorm: 101Room at Dorm 1...

phrases.pCn: 不仅……而且…… 并且；表强调

trans.tranOther: in addition to something else that you have mentioned
